channel.title: HP on Kazuhide Mimura's page
channel.description: Recent content in HP on Kazuhide Mimura's page

item.title: About logo
item.description: I created a logo with based on three letters “mim” in my name. It contains designs of ichthyoliths (microfossils of fish teeth and denticles) and deep sea sediment cores that I work on. ref: International Ocean Discovery Program
